snippet.textDisplay: I always asked why people use redux for everything, while they could achieve the same with context or simpler state management libs. This video is proof of it. Unfortunately using context takes a lot of care to avoid re-renders, but zustand demonstrate it can look simple and do the job.
snippet.textOriginal: I always asked why people use redux for everything, while they could achieve the same with context or simpler state management libs. This video is proof of it. Unfortunately using context takes a lot of care to avoid re-renders, but zustand demonstrate it can look simple and do the job.

snippet.textDisplay: Just remember to make sure you use selectors with your zustand hook. :)
snippet.textOriginal: Just remember to make sure you use selectors with your zustand hook. :)
